Home > Viral > Comedian Eats Picture Of Jason Segel Everyday Until Jason Segel Returns Favor Comedian Eats Picture Of Jason Segel Everyday Until Jason Segel Returns Favor 0 0   19, 2017 at 02:51am Will Jason Segel ever respond? 
Actor Jason Segel may have found success in such films as Forgetting Sarah Marshall and The Muppets , but this week he's been presented with a challenge that's possibly beyond his skill set. Toronto comedian Noah Maloney is eating a photograph of Jason Segel every single day, and will only stop once Jason Segel has eaten a photograph of Noah Maloney. 
Maloney has completed three painstaking days thus far. See below. 
What do you guys think? Will Jason Segel respond? Should Jason Segel respond? Does Jason Segel exist? We'll keep you posted. Let us know your thoughts in the comments below. < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 19, 2017 at 02:51am 471 Views
